returns._0: pollId The ID of the created poll
true if active and not expired

closePoll(uint64).notice: Close a poll (can be called after end time or by creator)

getPollOptions(uint64).notice: Get all options for a poll

getTopicPolls(uint32).notice: Get all polls for a topic

getUserCreatedPolls(address).notice: Get polls created by a user

getUserVote(uint64,address).notice: Get user's vote on a poll

getUserVotedPolls(address).notice: Get polls a user has voted on

getWeightedPercentages(uint64).notice: Get percentage distribution of weighted votes

isPollActive(uint64).notice: Check if poll is still active

vote(uint64,uint8).notice: Cast a vote on a poll
